K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:448b-1: siddha ae ka b'i ra mah'a tantra ra dza n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:448b-3: dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:448b-5: dpal bo gcig grub dpa' bo'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:448b-6: rab mchog smra ba rnams kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:448b-8: 'jig rten don du rgyud rab gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:448b-9: lha nyid gsang sngags tshul gyis ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:448b-13: sngags pa lus ni rnam dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:448b-14: gang tshe dngos grub phra mo 'grub //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449a-19: rdo rgyus kyis rnga pa ta ha la bris shing rnga lcags la mngon par bzlas pa'i rnga pa ta ha'i sgras ser ba zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449a-20: de bzhin du dung la sogs pa'i sgras kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449a-24: dh'a ra ya dh'a ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449a-26: de ba da ta aurnna ma ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449a-27: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshogs 'bum phrag gcig yongs su bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-0: thog 'bang @449b pa'am; kha ba la sogs pa dran pa tsam nyid kyis zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-1: char ches pa la thal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-2: yungs kar la mngon par bzlas na char ches pa gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-4: sbrang ma la sogs pa'i mchu 'ching bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-8: byi ba rnams kyis nye bar 'tshe ba zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-9: dur khrod kyi ras la ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te dur khrod kyi bum par bcug nas kha bcad de de nyid du sbas pas mngal rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-11: chus bkrus te chur bor bas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-15: lo ma la mngon par bris te spra tshil gyi nang du gtums pa'i sngags 'di grog mkhar gyis las 'jigs byed kyi gzugs su byas pa de'i snying gar bcug ste thal bas bkang nas sbas na rgol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-16: phyir rgol pa'i kha rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-17: rtsod sbyong byed pa na gzugs de nyid kyi lce la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i tsher ma bdun gyis btsugs na kha 'ching ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:449b-18: rdo rgyus kyis khams phor la bris te thal bas bkang la kha sbyar du byas te sbas na ni mi snyan par smra ba'i kha rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450a-1: pa phyis nas 'jim pa las lug gi gzugs byas pa'i snying gar spra tshil gyis gtums pa'i sngags bcug na khros pa'i kha rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450a-2: ske'am dpung pa la btags na g-yul ngogs kyi mtshon cha'i dpal zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450a-3: grog mkhar gyi 'jim pa las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i mthil du sngags kyi rgyal po bcug ste bzhi mdor sbas na 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450a-4: 'ong ba thams cad rengs par byed cing brtags pa byed pa thams cad rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450a-6: gos la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te de nyid kyi khong par bcug la bum pa sar pa chus bkang ba'i nang du bcug na yongs su brtag pa rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450a-7: bla gos kyi mtha' ma la sngags rjes su dran zhing mdud pa bcings pas lam du rkun po la sogs pa rengs par byed cing nags kyi ba men la sogs pa rva can rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450a-8: mche ba can rnams rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450a-9: gyo mol lan bdun bzlas te chur bcug na chu gnas pa rnams kha bcings par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-0: dur khrod kyi ras la pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi gtso bo'i ming smos pa'i sngags sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su bris pa sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyi rol du yi ge lam brgyad bris shing phyi rol @450b dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-1: phyogs rdo rjes brgyan pa'i spra tshil las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug pa'i sngags pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi sa mtshams su bcug na dpung gi tshogs rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-2: sngags aom gnyis kyi kha sbyor du bcug la yi ge tha zung gis yongs su bskor ba'i phyi rol du yi ge lam brgyad kyis bskor ba dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis non pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-3: sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-4: grog mkhar gyi 'jim pa las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug nas dur khrod kyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste dur khrod du sbas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-5: phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-6: grong khyer tshig pa'i me la mngon du phyogs shing sngags 'dis mngon par sngags ba'i chu snyim pa bdun rab tu gtor na khyim gang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i khyim de srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-7: thal bas mgul ba bcings pas skyugs pa zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-8: mthe'u chung gi rtse dam du btsir la sngags brjod pas skyigs bu med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:450b-9: thal ba mngon par sngags pas mig rengs pa sos par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-0: 'brum bu la sogs pa rnam par 'tshe ba la byang bu la bris te khyim gang gi sgor btags @451a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-1: pa'i khyim der 'brum bu la sogs pa'i rnam par 'tshe ba zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-5: 'bras chan la sogs pa sbyin par 'gyur ba las grong gi phyi rol gyi char gtor ma chen po gtang bar bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-7: 'bru lnga'i bye brag mar la btags pas grong gi dbus su zhi ba'i thab khung du byas la sbyin sreg byas na bdud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-8: rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-9: gang 'ga' zhig la grong la sogs pa 'byin par 'gyur ba la bzlas pa tsam gyis zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-10: rtag tu bzlas na lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-12: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-13: dpal rje btsun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dus su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-14: bdud bzhi las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mdzod spu las rnam par phyung ba'i mdzod spu'i nor bu zhes bya bar rab tu grags pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451a-15: gseg ma la mngon par sngags te gtor bas sbrul dag 'byer bar byed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-4: sngags 'di ma bsgrubs su zin na yang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-7: dur khrod kyi ro bsregs pa'i shing gi phur bu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i sgo'i steng du sbas na skyed kyis 'tsho ba thams cad kyi skyed med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-9: aom ni hi ni tstsha le aa bha ya bha yam ka ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-10: ae lu be lu tsu le lu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-11: shi l'a ya da ai dza ha ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-13: ae pe lu a'a ga sa pa the ke ra te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-15: sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis sdar smos pa'i las rnams ma bsgrubs su zin kyang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-16: de las gzhan pa mngon par 'dod pa'i las thams cad byed pa the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:451b-19: phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rnams 'byer bar byed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:453a-0: bcings pa la phyogs par byed pas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chu snyim pa bdun mngon par gtor ba dus gsum du byas pas bcings pa rnams @453a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:454b-1: gro ga la bris pa'i sngags rked pa'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:455a-5: srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed cing 'thab pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:455a-16: aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na h'um phat/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:455b-0: spra tshil gyis gzugs sor bzhi pa byas pa de'i tshad du byas pa'i snying gar bsgrub @455b byar [?] ming dang bcas pa'i sngags mngon bar bris te bcug la de'i kha la tsher ma btsugs na phyir rgol ba'i kha phur bus btab par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:455b-16: aom ka sye spanda spanda tva /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:455b-19: aom k'a shi spanda ka she spanda tve n+ye sh'u n+ya be shma ni aasma karnna ta th'a spanda ya th'a si badzra na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:455b-20: mig 'gul na byabs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:455b-21: aom dzambhe mo hi hri da ya m'a brt'a ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:456a-0: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di tho rangs bya rog gi sgra ma grag pa'i dus su lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chus @456a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:456a-22: slob ma yon tan gzhi yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:456a-23: bla ma la gus mkhas pa la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:456b-6: me ru manda ra pra ti k'a sa a'a bi sha /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457a-12: gong du bshad pa'i tshogs me long ngam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457a-20: sngags 'di khri bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-0: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus te dgos pa yid la byed pa'i bzlas pas mi smra bar nyal na @457b bcom ldan 'das rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur zhing dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-1: mi dge ba rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-2: aom pra dzv'a la h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-3: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon po'i snying po 'di 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-4: gong du bstan pa'i cho gas dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-5: mi dge ba rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-6: aom na ma: sa manta buddha n'am: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-8: ku m'a ra r'u pi nam darsha ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:457b-21: 'dzam bu ti ka la mngon par sngags pa'i gtor ma nye bar bstabs la dus gsum du sngags bzlas na zhag dang po la mtshan ma nye bar ston par byed cing phyis 'ong ba 'grub par 'gyur te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:459a-10: ras bal gyi sa bon gyi tshad tsam gyi gu gul gyi ril bu mngar gsum las btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum mam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464a-19: de dag srang gi bzhi char shes //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-0: de la 'di dag @464b blugs byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-1: de dag thams cad cha mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-2: me chung ngu la de bskol bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-3: de nas 'thungs pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-4: bla med ngag ni dag 'gyur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-5: mtshan bdun nye bar longs spyad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-7: zla gsum nya bar longs spyod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-8: mi ni shes rab gnas su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-9: zla gsum rab tu sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-11: zla ba drug gis mngon sum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-12: mi ni ngag dbang mtshungs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-13: mdze nad bco brgyad dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-14: za byed chen po bdun 'joms byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-15: aom aa nanta dzny'a na shr'i ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-17: gong du smos pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba'i ngag gi dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsams la sngar bshad pa'i rim pas sngags bzlas pa byas na gong du smos pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-18: aom aa ra pa tsa na dh'i: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-19: dben par dkyil 'khor byas te bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-20: bla ma rje btsun yang dag par mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-21: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-22: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharma sva bh'a ba shud dhonyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-23: zhes bya ba'i sngags lan gsum gyi bar du brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:464b-25: 'jig rten rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par bsams la stong pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-1: po'i steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-2: sku mdog dkar po ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-3: po ti bsnams par bdag nyid yud tsam gyes yongs su grub par rnam par bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-4: ngag gi dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi g-yas su skra can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-5: g-yon du nye ba'i skra can ma rin po che'i padma bsnams pa; sku mdog dkar mor rnam par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-6: mdun du nyi ma'i 'od sku mdog dkar mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-8: rgyab tu zla 'od zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa autpal bsnams pa rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-9: de nas rang gi snying la 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs yongs su 'phro ba'i yi ge aa yongs su bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-10: de yongs su gyur ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-11: ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pas rnam par spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-12: yongs su gsal bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-13: myur du 'khor bar bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-14: de ltar goms par byas pa las zla ba drug gis sngon ma thos pa'i bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465a-15: gzhung gi sgo nas mngon sum du 'gyur zhing le gcig gis ngag gi dbang phyug dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-0: aa ra pa tsa na'i 'khor lo'i @465b cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-1: aom b'a g'i shva ri mum/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-2: sngags 'di snga ma bzhin du bzlas pas gong du smos pa'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-3: 'khor lo'i dbus su yi ge mum dmar po 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs can blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-4: shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-6: b'a g'i shva ra mum sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-7: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas lnga po'i bdag nyid du bsams la yi ge mum gyi snying po can gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-8: de ltar rnam par bsams na sngar bshad pa'i 'bras bu rnams skyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-9: aom badzra t'i kshna ba ra da mu:sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-10: bdag nyid yi ge mum yongs su gyur pa las me'i phung po lta bus phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-11: ngag gi dbang phyug dpa' bo gcig pu grub par yud tsam rnam par bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:465b-12: rang gi snying gar yi ge aom las yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer brgya stong gis rnam par spras pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa snang bar byed pa rnam par bsams par byas nas zla ba drug tsam gyis ngag gi dbang phyug dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing sngar smos pa'i 'bras bu rnams 'dis skyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-0: dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las le du gsum @466a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-2: la b'a n'am bha s'o shi t'i kshno si au da gro si bha yam ka ra:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-6: da ha tva tsan na kh'a na n+ya bi da ha sthi ni aa sth'i ni bhyo ma dzdza ka da ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-9: la b'a nam bhi na de ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-10: la ba nam ba tsa ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-11: shva ni tam la ba ne hr'i ya m'a ne ku to ni da ku dor ti: ya di ba sa ti yo dza na sh'a te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-12: nan d'i n'am tsa sha tanta re na ga re lo ha pra k'a re krishna sarba kri t'a ku le ta tre ba ba sam'a ni hil ba na bandha su ra skri ta:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-13: aom tsi tsi tsi tsi bi klo li bi klo li aa mu kam sa dha na pa ri p'a ram me bas m'a na ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-14: sden du bsnyen pa'i cho ga khri byas la de'i 'og tu bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-15: me tog dang ldan pa'i shid mya ngan med pa'i rtsa bar bzhugs pa'i rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs sku mdog dmar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-17: na bza' dmar po'i rgyan gyis rjes su byugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-24: g-yon gnyis na sgrol ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-25: khro gnyer can gnyis dang bcas par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466a-26: dus gsum du tshva'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na nyi ma bdun gyis skyes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-0: @466b zhag nye shu rtsa gcig gis skyes bu chen po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-1: tshva dang bcas pa'i spra tshil gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-2: seng ldeng gi me mdag du ba med pa la dus gsum sngags brjod pas bsres na gang gi ming nas bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-3: rdo rje'i chu la sogs pa'i tshva la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa sbyin par bya zhing zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-4: aom la ba n'am bho si tikshno si au da gro si hri da yam ga ma aa mu ka sya hri da yam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-6: lo ke tsi ki ha sa ka:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-11: mah'a lo li aa mu kam me ba sa m'a na ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-12: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas la dus gsum du tsha chu khyor gang gi ming dang bcas 'thungs na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-14: ske tshe cha mnyam par byas pa gang gi ming dang bcas de sbyin sreg byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-16: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying po srid pa gsum dbang du bya ba'i las thogs pa med par 'gugs par grags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-17: sngar smos pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te yi ge 'bum bzlas pa byas la phyis chen [?] dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:466b-21: so rtsi la sogs pa gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-0: @467a *// spos dri zhim pos bdag nyid la bdugs na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-1: me tog dmar po'i sbyin sreg gang gi ming dang byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-3: btung ba la mngon par sngags te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-4: skyes bu chen po dbang du byed pa yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-7: zhag bzang po la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-11: ga bur la sogs pas autpa la'i 'dab ma lta bu'i rtsibs bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-12: 'khor lo'i dbus su sgrub pa po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-13: bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-14: 'dab ma rnams la ku ru kulle zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhis brten pa'i dbus su bsgrub bya gcig pu'i ming bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467a-15: phyi rol nas yi ge aom rim pa gsum du byas pa'i 'khor lo la skud pa dmar pos bcings nas spra tshil gyi rang bzhin can gyi gzugs kyi snying ga'i dbus su bcug la seng ldeng gi me mdag la dus gsum du bsros na rkang pas 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-0: bud med dbang du byed na zangs ma'i khab kyis rkang pa phug la bsros @467b pas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-1: yi ge yam las yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-2: de'i steng du yongs su gnas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba skra ma bcings shing gcer bu mgrin pa zhags pas bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-3: snying la lcags kyus bsnun pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-4: rlung gi shugs can gyi rig sngags kyis thams cad drangs te sgrub pa po'i rkang pa'i drung du lhung zhing bya ba thams cad rnam par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-5: goms par byas pas nam mkha' las 'dren par yang bsgoms pa tsam gyis 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-7: ka ra lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-8: dus gsum du me tog dri zhim po la sogs pas mngon par mchod cing sngags bzlas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-9: padma dkar po'i sdong bu byas la ba ser skya'i mar gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-10: so ma btang ba'i kham phor la du ba chags pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pas mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-11: dur khrod du ka p'a la chen po la padma dkar po'i sdong bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-12: snum chen pos mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-13: bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo du ba bsgrub par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:467b-14: des mig la bskus na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-5: sa m'a dhi bardha ta yan tum/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-9: shi khi gra ha de ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-13: kra ma ni y'a dzu ho mi ha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-14: sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bsnyen pa'i cho ga byas la khang pa'i mdun gyi dbus su ba lcis byugs la gru bzhir bres te d'ur ba'i gcal bkram nas me sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-15: aar ga'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad blangs la sngags bzlas shing me tog re re me la sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa'i skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-16: bud med 'gugs par 'gyur zhes mkhas pas de ltar shes par byas la gus par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-17: dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-18: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-19: lotstsha ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-023:468a-20: dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas gtan la phab pa //
